title: Showcase Presents: The House of Secrets, Vol. 1
description: What evil resides in.... the House of Secrets? This 544-page black-and-white value-priced trade paperback collects classic tales of mystery from the pages of THE HOUSE OF SECRETS #81-98 and a wealth of art from macabre masters Jerry Grandenetti, Bill Draut, Werner Roth, Dick Giordano, as well as the storytelling talents of Mike Friedrich, Gerry Conway, Marv Wolfman, among many others!
author: Mike Friedrich
